name: Clef
description:
Aim of the game is destroy the other tank. You can move left and right and change the angle of your cannon. The tank can shoot as fast as you can tap the shoot button.

At the menu, use the arrow keys to navigate and x or m to select and return to the menu.

P1 Controls- Move: Left/Right, Aim: Up/Down, Shoot: N

P2 Controls- Move: S/F, Aim: E/D, Shoot: A
